metadata.title: CVE-2021-33631 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in openEuler kernel on Linux(filesystem modules) allows Forced Integer Overflow.This issue affectsopenEuler kernel: from 4.19.90 before 4.19.90-2401.3, from 5.10.0-60.18.0before 5.10.0-183.0.0.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
